example: pro = ts.pro_api(); df = pro.daily(ts_code='000001.SZ', start_date='20180701', end_date='20180718')

parameters.fields: 可选字段列表，用逗号分隔，如 'quarter,gdp,gdp_yoy'

example: pro = ts.pro_api(); df = pro.cn_gdp(start_q='2018Q1', end_q='2019Q3'); df2 = pro.cn_gdp(start_q='2018Q1', end_q='2019Q3', fields='quarter,gdp,gdp_yoy')
